attributes.action: explain why petitions addressed to this site "vanish"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My experience of this site is unlikely to be different to others experiences, yet I have submitted 3 petitions to this site in the last two weeks, and none have appeared, nor their lack of visibility explained.  Neither do they appear in the rejected list.  Explain?

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
